summary: In Seoul, Korea, two sisters must look after each other when their mother leaves them to search for their estranged father.
cast: Gil-Byung Chae|Jung Gil Ja|Shin Hyun Je|Kim Mi Jung|Hee-yeon Kim|Il-Woo Kim|Mi-hyang Kim|Song-hee Kim|Soo-ah Lee|Sung Sook Lee|Lee Hyun Seo|Park Boon Tak|Lee Kang Won|Ha Min Woo|Lee Byung Yong
director: Director: So Yong Kim (as So-yong Kim)
title: Na-moo-eobs-neun san
